review: I had some wi-fi connection issues when I first got the stick (i.e. shows would take up to 30 seconds, or longer, to load, and there would be multiple stop and stutters while streaming programs), probably because the TV was blocking the wi-fi signal from the Amazon stick (I was using the dongle provided with the stick that suspended the stick behind the TV, which the online help guide suggested, but it didnt improve the performance), but I've added a wi-fi extender to my TV setup, so now the stick loads tv shows and movies much faster. I wish there were a bit more of a unique library to Amazon Prime TV shows and movies that set them apart from Netflix, but there enough shows streaming on Amazon Prime that aren't on Netflix that make this device worth investing in if you like streaming your entertainment.
